name: KILL MACH
description:
KILL MACH: Your goal is to kill the enemies, and get to the green 'Portal'.

This game was made for Trijam #133 in 3 hours!  It is a first person shooter game.  It is still a prototype though, but I do plan on developing more of the game, like adding better gameplay, graphics, sound, looks, levels, etc.  All of the sound, assets, levels, code, etc.  was made in the 3 hours!  I use some assets that were royalty free/CC0, so I didn't put them into the credits.  There was one model that wasn't royalty free, so check out the credits below.

You must head to the green block/portal to continue.

Note: If you have a windows computer, it is highly recommended that you download the windows version of the game.  The web version is fine, but there are probably bugs/issues that I simply didn't have the time to fix.

Controls:

WASD = Moving Around

Space = Jump

Left Mouse Button = Shoot

Right Mouse Button = Zoom

Shift = Sprint

Credits:

Game developed by: thisGameDev

Extras:

Skeleton Model: https://sketchfab.com/3d-models/low-poly-skeleton-1eda2e7cf99d4636bc9937db3e6d9d...
